name: Boduan
description:
Boduan, 2021, Nicholas Delap

CG Sculpture, Video Loop.

‘Boduan’ is a virtual ‘Broach’, which takes inspiration from the other-worldly metal artworks crafted by the people who inhabited Britain during the Iron Age. The Broach was sculpted using computer design software and is placed in a virtual environment, indicative of the wild landscape surrounding the ancient Hill fort ‘Garn Boduan’ in North Wales.
